fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance readability with a touch of elegance, suitable for a professional document.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen fonts provide good legibility at various sizes, ensuring comfortable reading experiences for users.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The hierarchy is established through font sizes, weights, and styles, guiding users through different levels of information.
fontTheory.fontPairings: The combination of serif and sans-serif fonts creates a visual contrast that enhances the document's structure and readability.
